Generation II.Gold: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.
Generation II.Silver: It nests at the edge of sharp cliffs. It spends all day carrying food to its awaiting chicks.
Generation II.Crystal: It always carries its food with it, wherever it goes. If attacked, it throws its food at the opponent.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had. Generation VII.Sun: Although it naturally prefers colder locales, Delibird in Alola seem able to withstand the heat to a certain extent.
Generation VII.Moon: It has a generous habit of sharing its food with people and Pokémon, so it's always scrounging around for more food.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It shares its food with people who are stranded. Because Delibird is omnivorous, sometimes it gives those people bug Pokémon.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It wraps food in its tail to carry it around. The Delibird with the biggest tail is the boss of the flock!
